description: Dialogue between the player and the game or the employee

introDialogue.question: You see a clothing store and are about to enter it. blablabla. Do you want the game version or chill version?

introEmployee.question: Hello and welcome to _store_. My name's Sandra and I'll assist you anyway I can today. Can I just say I loooove your style?
answers: Hello Sandra! I love yours too!
